main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted in Northeast Pennsylvania on June 25, 2002.
interesting points: The object was first observed as a bright flash near the horizon, then began moving very fast and suddenly disappeared.
The object was described as saucer-shaped, bright silver in color, and reflecting sunlight.
The sighting was observed by a State Policeman and a civilian and was considered an unidentified flying object.
The report includes sketches showing the object's motion and position, but no photographs.
